page.title: 06ST.ERNEY PRIEST
page.content: For 15 years Rev Richards was vicar of St. Erney, (the church here is named after St. Terminus),Landrake, Botus Fleming and Hatt, an area of about 49 sq/miles and a population of 2500. {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF REV RICHARDS} 0530 _ Rise _0800 _ Study, read, write letters etc 0800 _ Breakfast _1230 _ write sermons at home _2100 _ Visits Parish if there are no weddings etc attends meetings 2100 _ watch news 2300 _ bed On Thursday mornings he teaches at Landrake.It is his belief that a visiting Parson is the best Parson. Rev Richards house is the newest house in St. Erney and is 10 years old.
